channel.title: なつかしのテニスゲーム! へのコメント
channel.description: アリエクでポチった JUNKHACK

item.title: 夏休み工作第二段 Arduino 単体でPong | junkhack より
item.dc:creator: 夏休み工作第二段 Arduino 単体でPong | junkhack

item.title: JunkHack より
item.dc:creator: JunkHack
item.description:
Hello, ROBERTO.
Thank you for coming to play. I saw a video of Pong of version 1.1. cool! Controller for two people, I want to also make their own. Once completed, it will report on the blog.
see you.
item.content:encoded:
Hello, ROBERTO.

Thank you for coming to play. I saw a video of Pong of version 1.1.
cool!
Controller for two people, I want to also make their own. Once completed, it will report on the blog.

see you.

item.title: Roberto より
item.dc:creator: Roberto
item.description: Wow, I am happy to see that someone so far from my home is interested in this little project I have done! If you like, you can try now the second version of the code that runs for two players. The code and the link to a new video are in the same Arduino Forum Post at position #13. Enjoy! PS I have used Google translator to read your page, I cannot read ideograms.
item.content:encoded:
Wow, I am happy to see that someone so far from my home is interested in this little project I have done!
If you like, you can try now the second version of the code that runs for two players. The code and the link to a new video are in the same Arduino Forum Post at position #13.
Enjoy!
PS I have used Google translator to read your page, I cannot read ideograms.
